backend/main.mo: Defines user profiles and multiple school data models (study materials, assignments, exams, attendance, results, announcements) with access‑controlled CRUD-style functions.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries describing branding image updates, PWA icon replacements, and in‑app logo path updates with associated files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains short descriptive summaries of various frontend files, covering global styles, UI components, pages, and configuration.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind and OKLCH color variables for light/dark themes along with base element styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting app metadata, linking updated PWA icons, and loading the React client.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest specifying icons, theme colors, app metadata, and maskable icon assets.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component handling section navigation, theming, and layout composition with header and bottom navigation.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: Renders fixed bottom navigation with six sections using icon buttons and active-state styling.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Displays the school logo and handles Internet Identity login/logout with query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Dialog that prompts new authenticated users to enter and save their profile name using react-query mutations.
frontend/src/components/QueryState.tsx: Reusable UI components for loading skeletons, empty states, and error alerts.
frontend/src/constants/branding.ts: Exports branding metadata including school name, location, and logo path.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/auth.ts: React-query hooks for fetching and saving the caller’s user profile via the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/dashboard.ts: React-query hooks to load student profile, exam results, and notifications from the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/discipline.ts: Provides a react-query hook to fetch a student's attendance records.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/education.ts: React-query hooks for study materials, assignments, exams, exam results, and announcements.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and manages the backend actor based on Internet Identity and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and status states.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables defining the school's color theme and dark mode palette.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts React, sets up the query client, and wraps the app with Internet Identity.
frontend/src/pages/dashboard/DashboardSc: Renders the student dashboard, handling authentication and loading user, student, exam, and notification data with summary cards.
frontend/src/pages/discipline/Attendance: Displays attendance summary and record list for the authenticated student, with loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/discipline/BehaviorUp: Shows a login prompt if unauthenticated and otherwise displays an empty state for behavior updates.
frontend/src/pages/discipline/Discipline: Provides tabbed navigation for rules, attendance, behavior updates, and guidelines sections.
frontend/src/pages/discipline/Guidelines: Lists school policies and guidelines in styled cards.
frontend/src/pages/discipline/RulesCodeS: Shows the school's code of conduct and a list of rules.
frontend/src/pages/education/Announcemen: Displays full details of a selected announcement with a back button.
Fetches, sorts, and lists announcements with selectable detail view and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/education/AssignmentD: Shows detailed assignment information including title, class, due date, and description.
frontend/src/pages/education/Assignments: Displays assignments with class-based filtering, sorting by due date, and navigation to a detailed view.
frontend/src/pages/education/EducationSc: Provides a tabbed interface for accessing study materials, assignments, exams, and announcements.
Shows detailed information about a selected exam including subject, class, date, and description.
frontend/src/pages/education/ExamsList.t: Lists exams with class filtering, schedule/results tabs, and navigation to an exam detail view.
frontend/src/pages/education/StudyMateri: Displays detailed study material information with description and optional resource link.
Shows study materials with class filtering and allows opening a detail view for each item.
frontend/src/pages/HomeScreen.tsx: Home screen UI showing hero branding and quick-access cards for major app sections.
frontend/src/pages/notices/CircularDetai: Renders full details of a selected circular including title, date, and message.
frontend/src/pages/notices/CircularsList: Lists placeholder circulars and supports navigating to a detailed circular view.
frontend/src/pages/notices/EventUpdateDe: Displays detailed information for a selected event update with title, date, and description.
frontend/src/pages/notices/EventUpdatesL: Shows a list of event updates with selectable cards and navigates to a detail view.
frontend/src/pages/notices/HolidayList.t: Renders a sorted list of holidays with dates and labels using card components.
frontend/src/pages/notices/NoticesScreen: Provides a tabbed interface for viewing circulars, holidays, and event updates.
frontend/src/pages/sports/AchievementsGa: Displays a gallery of sports achievements with images and titles.
frontend/src/pages/sports/ActivitiesFaci: Lists available sports activities and facilities with icons and descriptions.
frontend/src/pages/sports/FitnessTrainin: Shows a weekly fitness training schedule with activities, times, and levels.
frontend/src/pages/sports/SportsScreen.t: Provides tab navigation for sports activities, events, achievements, and fitness schedules.
frontend/src/pages/sports/TournamentEven: Displays full details for a selected sports tournament event including date, location, and description.
frontend/src/pages/sports/TournamentsEve: React component showing a list of tournament events with clickable cards that open a detail view using placeholder data.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters, including hash-based query parsing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, shadows, animations, and enabling plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing branding update tasks, image requirements, and requested features for replacing app icons and logos.
